verses.verse: Now <WG1161> concerning things sacrificed to idols<WG1494>: We<WG2192> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> we<WG2192> all<WG3956> have<WG2192> knowledge<WG1108>. Knowledge<WG1108> puffeth up<WG5448>, but<WG1161> love<WG26> edifieth<WG3618>.
<WG1161> If<WG1487> any man<WG5100> thinketh<WG1380> that he knoweth<WG1492> anything<WG5100>, he knoweth<WG1097> not<WG3762> yet<WG3764> as<WG2531> he ought<WG1163> to know<WG1097>;
but <WG1161> if<WG1487> any man<WG5100> loveth<WG25> God<WG2316>, the same<WG3778> is known<WG1097> by<WG5259> him<WG846>.

Concerning <WG4012> therefore<WG3767> the eating<WG1035> of things sacrificed to idols<WG1494>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> no idol<WG1497> is anything<WG3762> in<WG1722> the world<WG2889>, and<WG2532> that<WG3754> there is no3762, Exodus87 God<WG2316> but1487, 3361 one<WG1520>.

For <WG1063> though<WG1512> there be<WG1526> that are called<WG3004> gods<WG2316>, whether<WG1535> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> or<WG1535> on<WG1909> earth<WG1093>; as<WG5618> there are<WG1526> gods<WG2316> many<WG4183>, and<WG2532> lords<WG2962> many<WG4183>;

yet <WG235> to us<WG2254> there is one<WG1520> God<WG2316>, the Father<WG3962>, of<WG1537> whom<WG3739> are all things<WG3956>, and<WG2532> we<WG2249> unto<WG1519> him<WG846>; and<WG2532> one<WG1520> Lord<WG2962>, Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, through<WG1223> whom<WG3739> are all things<WG3956>, and<WG2532> we<WG2249> through<WG1223> him<WG846>.

Howbeit <WG235> there is not<WG3756> in<WG1722> all men<WG3956> that knowledge<WG1108>: but<WG1161> some<WG5100>, being used<WG4893> until<WG2193> now<WG737> to the idol<WG1497>, eat<WG2068> as<WG5613> of a thing sacrificed to an idol<WG1494>; and<WG2532> their<WG846> conscience<WG4893> being<WG5607> weak<WG772> is defiled<WG3435>.

But <WG1161> food<WG1033> will not<WG3756> commend<WG3936> us<WG2248> to God<WG2316>: <WG3777> neither<WG3777>, if<WG1437> we eat<WG5315> not<WG3361>, are we the worse<WG5302>; nor<WG3777>, if<WG1437> we eat<WG5315>, are we the better<WG4052>.
But <WG1161> take heed<WG991> lest by any means<WG3381> this<WG3778> liberty<WG1849> of yours<WG5216> become<WG1096> a stumblingblock<WG4348> to the<WG3588> weak<WG770>.

For <WG1063> if<WG1437> a man<WG5100> see<WG1492> thee<WG4571> who hast<WG2192> knowledge<WG1108> sitting at meat<WG2621> in<WG1722> an idol<WG1493>'s temple, will<WG3618> not<WG3780> his<WG846> conscience<WG4893>, if he is<WG5607> weak<WG772>, be emboldened<WG3618> to eat2068, 1519 things sacrificed to idols<WG1494>?
For <WG2532> through<WG1909> thy<WG4674> knowledge1108, 622 he that is weak<WG770> perisheth<WG622>, the brother<WG80> for<WG1223> whose sake<WG3739> Christ<WG5547> died<WG599>.

And <WG1161> thus<WG264>, sinning <WG3779> against<WG1519> the brethren<WG80>, and<WG2532> wounding<WG5180> their<WG846> conscience<WG4893> when it is weak<WG770>, ye sin<WG264> against<WG1519> Christ<WG5547>.

Wherefore <WG1355>, if<WG1487> meat<WG1033> causeth<WG4624> my<WG3450> brother<WG80> to stumble<WG4624>, I will eat5315, 3756 no<WG3361> flesh<WG2907> for<WG1519> evermore<WG165>, that<WG3361> I cause<WG4624> not my<WG3450> brother<WG80> to<WG2443> stumble<WG4624>.
